tests.test_external_regressors module¶

Testing external regressors if library if installed

class tests.test_external_regressors.TestSklearn[source]¶

Bases: object

Test some scikit-learn methods. Skips if sklearn is not installed

pytestmark = [Mark(name='skipif', args=(False,), kwargs={'reason': 'sklearn not installed, skipping.'})]¶

tests.test_mcr.test_mcr_tol_err_change(dataset)[source]¶

Test MCR exits due error increasing by a value

tests.test_mcr.test_mcr_tol_increase(dataset)[source]¶

Test MCR exits due error increasing above a tolerance fraction

tests.test_mcr.test_mcr_tol_n_above_min(dataset)[source]¶

Test MCR exits due to half-terating n times with error above the minimum error.

Note: On some CI systems, the minimum err bottoms out; thus, tol_n_above_min needed to be set to 0 to trigger a break.

tests.test_mcr.test_mcr_tol_n_increase(dataset)[source]¶

Test MCR exits due iterating n times with an increase in error

Note: On some CI systems, the minimum err bottoms out; thus, tol_n_above_min needed to be set to 0 to trigger a break.

tests.test_mcr.test_props_features_samples_targets(dataset)[source]¶

Test mcrals properties for features, targets, samples
